author: cnbc.com
title: TV SHAREHOLDER ALERT: The Law Offices of Vincent Wong Notifies Investors of an Investigation Involving Possible Securities Fraud Violations by the Board of Directors of Grupo Televisa, S.A.B.
text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- The Law Offices of Vincent Wong notifies investors of an investigation concerning whether Grupo Televisa, S.A.B. (“Grupo Televisa” or the “Company”) (NYSE:TV) violated federal securities laws.
Click here to learn about the case: http://docs.wongesq.com/TV-Info-Request-Form-1843 . There is no cost or obligation to you.
On November 14, 2017, during the corruption trial of three former FIFA executives, one former executive of the sports-marketing company Torneos y Competencias SA testified that several companies—including Grupo Televisa—had paid bribes in order to secure media rights for soccer tournaments. Then on January 26, 2018, Grupo Televisa announced that its Audit Committee had determined that certain material weaknesses in the Company’s internal control over financial reporting existed as of December 31, 2016.
To learn more about the investigation of Grupo Televisa contact Vincent Wong, Esq. either via email vw@wongesq.com , by telephone at 212.425.1140, or visit http://docs.wongesq.com/TV-Info-Request-Form-1843 .
Vincent Wong, Esq. is an experienced attorney that has represented investors in securities litigations involving financial fraud and violations of shareholder rights. Attorney advertising. Prior results do not guarantee similar outcomes.
